Downloaded from the URL by Mark Kittisopikul
June 5th, 2017
Original author: John D'Errico
Integer Partition
Needed to compute Faa Di Bruno coefficients for higher order differentiation of the composition of two functions.
Used in lamins/+orientationSpace/+diffusion
https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/12009-partitions-of-an-integer
